title: Resurrection, I Am Lu Bu

status: Resurrection, I am Lu Bu ;Língqì Fùsū, Wǒ Jiào Lǚbù ; Qi Resurgence: Rising of the Strongest Hero ; Resurrection, I Am Lu Bu ; Resuscitation of Spiritual Influence, My Name Is Lu Bu ; 灵气复苏，我叫吕布

description:
Description :
        Lü Bu, who was reincarnated into the era of spiritual energy recovery, became the hero of this world. After awakening the strongest Flying General System, he set his heart on becoming the strongest in the world and protecting his family.
